name: Stuck in dream
description:
Hello, Welcome to your dream. TRIGGER WARNING, THE GAME CONTAINS LOUD NOISE, AND FLASHING LIGHTS. omg a dreamcore game!!1? I don't know, but being honest, it's cool, isn't it? well i made the game for fun, just lettin' you know this game is not for kids (unless your kids enjoys to play cursed horror game)

what's the meaning of this game?

------------------------------------------------

Not based on a true story or anything, but i'll tell you You're in a random dream while you're sleeping, and confused with what is it (but you'll know, the dream will get way worse), what ends the entire dream is by someone waking you up with a loud sound.

- tip, avoid red grounds
